simplesect.para: Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified RoutineInfo The ICAS1 shall send the RoutineInfo parameter (1Byte) containing following parameters in the Positive Response to a RequestRoutineResults request
Remark:
- Bits 0 to 3: RoutineStatus - 0: RoutineInactive > If the routine has not been executed in the current operation cycle. - 1: RoutineActive > If the routine is being executed. - 2: RoutineAborted > If the Routine was stopped because of - an error - a safety reason - a session change to default session. - a KL15 change to KL15 OFF - 3: RoutineExecutionStuck > Routine is being executed, but cannot be stopped. - 4: RoutineFinishedCorrectly > the routine has been successfully executed in the current operation cycle - 5 :RoutineReturnedToEcuControl > the routine has been successfully stopped via StopRoutine request. - 6-F: RoutineSystemSupplierDefinedReachedStatus > Reserved Status for specific purposes. If a different status is needed for a routine, this will be defined in the corresponding requirement for the routine.
- Bits 4 to 7: RoutineResult This parameter is used to describe if the routine has generated results, and if they are correct or not. - 0: NoResultsAvailable - 1: IncorrectResults - 2: CorrectResults ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_266 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified RoutineStatusRecord The ICAS1 shall send the RoutineStatusRecord parameter in case it is defined for the requested routine, as defined in the table [Routinen] in the Positive Response to a RequestRoutineResults 0x03 request.
Remark: RoutineStatusRecord #1-#n
ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_267 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified NRC 0x12 SubfunctionNotSupported
When the ICAS1 receives a 0x31 with a Subfunction not supported (at all), or not supported for the routine, then the ICAS1 shall ignore the request and, depending on the addressing type: - In case of physical addressing, the ICAS1 responds with NRC 0x12 - In case of functional addressing, the ICAS1 does not send any response. ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_280 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified NRC 0x13 IncorrectMessageLengthOrInvalidFormat
The ICAS1 shall respond to a 0x31 request with this NRC when the length of the request is invalid. ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_281 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified NRC 0x22 ConditionsNotCorrect
The ICAS1 shall respond to a 0x31 request with this NRC in following situations: - when the ICAS1 receives a RoutineControl request, but at least one of the preconditions is not fulfilled - when the ICAS1 executes a Routine, but at least one of the conditions stop to be fulfilled - when the ICAS1 receives a StopRoutine request, which can or must not be stoped during its execution. This case is to be defined in the corresponding routine.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_282 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified NRC 0x24 RequestSequenceError The ICAS1 shall respond to a 0x31 request with this NRC in following situations: - when the ICAS1 receives a RequestRoutineResults for a routine which has not been started in the current OperationCycle. - when the ICAS1 receives a StartRoutine request for a routine which is already running. ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_283 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified NRC 0x31 RequestOutOfRange When the ICAS1 receives a 0x31 request and one of following applies: - the Routine Identifier is not supported - the RoutineControlOption contains invalid values - the Routine Identifier is not supported for the active configuration (i.E if the routine can be dissabled via Coding, DataSet or Adaptation)
then, the ICAS1 shall ignore the request and, depending on the request´s addressing type: - In case of physical addressing, the ICAS1 responds with NRC 0x31 - In case of functional addressing, the ICAS1 does not send any response. ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_284 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified NRC 0x33 SecurityAccessDenied The ICAS1 shall respond to a 0x31 request with NRC 0x33 when the security access level required for the requested Routine has not been released. ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_285 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified NRC 0x72 GeneralProgrammingFailure The ICAS1 shall respond to a 0x31 request with this NRC when the ICAS1 detects an internal error during the execution of the routine.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_286 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified Service Description
This service is cyclically requested by a diagnostic tester which previously requested a non-default session. The ICAS1 uses the reception of these requests to implement the Keep-Alive-Logic
Whenever a non-default session is active, the ICAS1 shall reset the S3server timer everytime it receives a TesterPresent request. If the TesterPresent request is not received for a time longer than S3server timeout, then the ICAS1 will perform a transition to default session as specified in transition 11 (in Application mode) in [Session transitions in Application mode]
This service shall work also with KL15 OFF
Session: 0x01 Default Session 0x02 ECU Programming-Session 0x03 Extended-Diagnostic-Session 0x40 VW-EOLSession 0x4F Development-Session
Remark: In Bootloader mode, the S3server timeout leads to a reset, as described in [Session transitions in Application mode] ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_332 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified Request and positive response
When the ICAS1 receives the following request
then the ICAS1 shall reset the S3server timer.
If the SuppressPositiveResponseBit has the value 0 - Then the ICAS1 shall respond with positive response with the ZeroSubFunction 1 - Then the ICAS1 shall not send any response ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_333 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified NRC 0x13 IncorrectMessageLengthOrInvalidFormat
The ICAS1 shall respond to a 0x3E request with this NRC when the length of the request is invalid. ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_335 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
Requirement is not satisfied

Requirement is not verified NRC 0x12 SubfunctionNotSupported
The ICAS1 shall respond to a 0x3E request with this NRC when the value of the ZeroSubFunction is not 0x00 ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_336 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_339
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c line 169 Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c line 277 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c.test line 101 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c.test line 420 IF the ICAS1 is in the NonDefaultSession all the pre-condition checks are passed
THEN The ICAS1 shall be able to execute ControlDTCSettings 0x85 ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_339 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_340
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/inc/DiagAppl_Impl.h line 441 Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c line 170 Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c line 278 Requirement is satisfied here: DCM_Service85_cyclic ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c line 384 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c.test line 102 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c.test line 421 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c.test line 732 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_Impl.c.test line 166 Preconditions / Abort conditions
The following conditions shall be fulfilled in order to respond to a ControlDTCSettings request.
IF the following condition is fulfilled, [Condition Vehicle Speed; ESP_v_Signal <= 5 km/h],
AND the 0x85 ControlDTCSetting is requested,
THEN the ICAS1 shall response to a ControlDTCSetting request.
(with a positive response)
ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_340 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_341
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c line 171 Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c line 279 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c.test line 103 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c.test line 422 Request and processing
When the ICAS1 receives the following request:
Then, the ICAS1 shall perform the corresponding checks and - If some check is failed, the ICAS1 responds with the corresponding NRC. - If all checks are passed, the ICAS1 performs the requested action and, if the bit SuppressPositiveResponseBit in the request is set to 0, the ICAS1 sends the positive response as defined below.
Session: 0x03 Extended-Diagnostic-Session 0x40 VW-EOLSession 0x4F Development-Session
Note: This req does not cover reenabling DTC setting when the preconditions are getting false after activation of the service. Refer to Diag_115.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_341 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_342
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c line 172 Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c line 280 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c.test line 104 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c.test line 423 DTCSettingType The subfunction parameter DTCSettingType from the request above shall be defined as follows :
IF the request for the ICAS1 to activate the update of the StatusOfDTC is in a normal behavior, THEN the ICAS1 shall set DTCSettingType == ON (0x01)
-OR-Condition- IF the request for the ICAS1 to deactivate the update of the StatusOfDTC, THEN the ICAS1 shall set DTCSettingType == OFF (0x02)
ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_342 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_344
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c line 173 Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c line 281 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c.test line 105 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c.test line 424 Positive Response
The ICAS1 shall send the following positive response when applies as per the request defined for ControlDTCSettings: - Byte1: 0xC5 - Byte2: DTCSettingType from the request as echo (0x01 or 0x02)
Note: The ICAS1 sends positive response also if the requested DTCSettingType was already active
ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_344 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_345
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c line 276 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c.test line 419 ControlDTCSettings = Off
When the ICAS1 deactivates the DTCSettings, all the results of the diagnosis monitoring shall be ignored (the StatusOfDTC Byte will not be changed).
Remark: ClearDiagnosticInformation will not affect an active ControlDTCSettings = OFF. This means, if during ControlDTCSettings = OFF, the tester deletes the DTC memory, the ControlDTCSettings will remain OFF.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_345 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c line 178 Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c line 286 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c.test line 110 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service85.c.test line 429 NRC 0x12 SubfunctionNotSupported

sect2.para:

The ICAS1 shall define LinkControlModeIdentifier as follow
0x12 CAN 500000 Baud - default baudrate for the Diagnostic CAN (Classic-CAN) 0x13 CAN 1000000 Baud - default baudrate for the Diagnostic CAN (Classic-CAN) 0x15 CAN 2000000 Baud - default baudrate for the Diagnostic CAN (CAN-FD) 0x1A CAN 4000000 Baud - default baudrate for the Diagnostic CAN (CAN-FD) 0x1C CAN 5000000 Baud - default baudrate for the Diagnostic CAN (CAN-FD) ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_361 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_363
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service87.c line 193 Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service87.c line 288 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service87.c.test line 107 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service87.c.test line 386 NRC 0x12 SubfunctionNotSupported
When the ICAS1 receives a 0x87 with a Subfunction LinkControlType not supported (at all), or not supported for the routine, then the ICAS1 shall ignore the request and, depending on the addressing type: - In case of physical addressing, the ICAS1 responds with NRC 0x12 - In case of functional addressing, the ICAS1 does not send any response. ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_363 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_364
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service87.c line 191 Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service87.c line 285 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service87.c.test line 105 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service87.c.test line 383 NRC 0x13 IncorrectMessageLengthOrInvalidFormat
The ICAS1 shall respond to a 0x87 request with this NRC when the length of the request is invalid. ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_364 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_366
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service87.c line 287 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service87.c.test line 385 NRC 0x24 RequestSequenceError The ICAS1 shall respond to a 0x87 request with this NRC in following situations if the sequence of the subfunction is not indicated from the Diagnostic tester
ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_366 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_367
sect2.para: Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service87.c line 192 Requirement is satisfied here: FUNC ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/src/DiagAppl_DCM_Service87.c line 286 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service87.c.test line 106 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/UDS_Services_Chorus/UDSServices/c/test/swut/DiagAppl_DCM_Service87.c.test line 384 NRC 0x31 RequestOutOfRange The ICAS1 shall respond to a 0x87 request with this NRC, if the LinkControlModeIdentifier received at the ICAS1 is invalid ID: SWR_ICAS1_Diag_367 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
